amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funding for Essential Air Service by $100 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to zero out the $100 million in funding for payments to air carriers and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 248 (Roll no. 422).
